Content: Hi everyone I'm a 69 year young fit Englishman living in Spain , Iv'e been away from biking for a number of years , well had a few 125 runabouts in recent years but previously rode Japanese sport bikes , last one being a Suzuki GSXR 750 . I am looking at returning to biking after quite a long hiatus . I have test riden the Honda cb650r and love it , am I mad buying one ? any thoughts or advice . I am looking to tour Spain again in short 300 -500 kmt spells so any thoughts .
